PerfectNetExp.abs: 3、三学期制 (Trimester)：三学期制将十二个月的学年分为三等份，为期十六星期长的学期，第一个三学期(秋季班) 于八月底或九月初 …
...（学年）：正常授课期，通常为9月到第二年6月份。各学校自行规定一学年分为两学期（semester）、三学期（trimester），还是四学期（quarter）。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French trimestre, from Latin trimestris, from tri- 'three' + mensis 'month'

means.word_mean: 1. a period of three months; especially one of the three three-month periods into which human pregnancy is divided
2. one of three divisions of an academic year
